quote: “You may choose to look the other way but you can never say again that you did not know.”
author: William Wilberforce

quote: “I'm not saying I'm gonna change the world, but I guarantee that I will spark the brain that will change the world.”
author: Tupac Shakur

quote: “To the world you may be one person but to one person you may be the world.”
author: Bill Wilson

quote: “The stupid neither forgive nor forget; the naive forgive and forget; the wise forgive but do not forget.”
author: Thomas Szasz

quote: “do not look for healingat the feet of thosewho broke you”
author: Rupi Kaur

quote: “Turn your obstacles into opportunities and your problems into possibilities.”
author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: “Real magic can never be made by offering someone else's liver. You must tear out your own, and not expect to get it back.”
author: Peter S. Beagle

quote: “Remember tonight... for it is the beginning of always”
author: Dante

quote: “My happiness is not the means to any end. It is the end. It is its own goal. It is its own purpose.”
author: Ayn Rand

quote: “It [feminism] is mixed up with a muddled idea that women are free when they serve their employers but slaves when they help their husbands.”
author: G.K. Chesterton

quote: “Go and make interesting mistakes, make amazing mistakes, make glorious and fantastic mistakes. Break rules. Leave the world more interesting for your being here.”
author: Neil Gaiman

quote: “Dreams don't work unless you take action. The surest way to make your dreams come true is to live them.”
author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: “We are saved by faith alone, but the faith that saves is never alone.”
author: Martin Luther

quote: “The duty of youth is to challenge corruption.”
author: Kurt Cobain

quote: “There is no passion to be found playing small - in settling for a life that is less than the one you are capable of living.”
author: Nelson Mandela

quote: “I don't paint dreams or nightmares, I paint my own reality.”
author: Frida Kahlo

quote: “Feet, what do I need them forIf I have wings to fly.”
author: Frida Kahlo

quote: “Envy is ignorance, Imitation is Suicide.”
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: “Being happy doesn't mean that everything is perfect. It means that you've decided to look beyond the imperfections.”
author: Gerard Way

quote: “When you look for a man- what you want to look for is a man with the heart of a poor boy and the mind of a conqueror.”
author: C. JoyBell C.

quote: “Maktub" (It is written.)”
author: Paulo Coelho

quote: “You don’t have to like someone, but you have to treat them as you wish to be treated.”
author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: “If you don't know who you truly are, you'll never know what you really want.”
author: Roy T. Bennett
